1.12.2.0.1.0:
-gaining levels through staying under the sky on a full moon night
-transform into a werewolf on full moon
-several commands
-base for goblin
-really buggy werewolf villager
-pure silver stuff
-server compatibility
1.12.2.1.0.0-beta1:
Added new structures, animations, sounds, models, commands and translations.
Created a base for vampires and hunters and added campfires and tents, new skills, aconite, monkshood, cotton and a hunter armor!
For the full changelog, see: https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.0.0-beta1%20Changelog.md
1.12.2.1.0.0:
Added new structures, animations, sounds, models, commands and translations.
Created a base for vampires and hunters and added campfires and tents, new skills, aconite, monkshood, cotton and a hunter armor!
For the full changelog, see: https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.0.0%20Changelog.md
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Added new guns (revolver, hunting rifle and pump shotgun), translations, textures and sounds!
Also implemented hunters, lowered skill costs, completely recoded the tent and added healing herbs, glow fern, magma flowers, poison ivies and wither moss!
For the full changelog, see: https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.1.0%20Changelog.md
1.12.2.1.1.1:
Fixed server crashes and transformation issues.
For the changelog from 1.1.0, see https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.1.0%20Changelog.md
1.12.2.1.1.2:
Fixed wolfsbane worldgen, items dropped during transformation will not despawn for 5 minutes after the transformation, werewolf claw and bite damage are now configurable, no messages and potion effects when infected by a werewolf and silver ore is now smeltable.
For the changelog from 1.1.0, see https://github.com/TheGamingLord/HuntersDream/blob/master/changelogs/1.x.x/Hunter's%20Dream%201.1.0%20Changelog.md
